vulnerabilities.name: Mass Assignment Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: The application allows users to set the 'admin' flag to true via mass assignment in the user update endpoint.
vulnerabilities.evidence: When sending a PUT request to /api/user with {"user": {"admin": true}}, the server accepted the change and set the user as admin. The response included a flag: flag{M4sS_AsS1gnm3nt}
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement a whitelist of allowed properties that can be updated by regular users, and ensure sensitive properties like 'admin' can only be modified by authorized administrators.
